titleZh: Meta人工智能部门重大改组：扎克伯格任命值得信赖的副手“救火”
titleEn: Major Shakeup in Meta's AI Division: Zuckerberg Deploys Trusted Lieutenant for "Firefighting"
descriptionZh: 就在这个关键时刻，扎克伯格再次介入，重组了高管团队。
descriptionEn: At this critical juncture, Zuckerberg has once again intervened to restructure the executive team. Former Metaverse lead Vishal Shah has been tasked with overseeing AI product management, assisting Nat Friedman in integrating AI product strategy. This combination of an externally appointed "executive" and seasoned veterans may help stabilize Meta's accelerated AI development.

title: NVIDIA成全球首家5万亿美元公司，“GPU帝国”GDP超日本、德国
description: 就在不久前，NVIDIA 的市值突破了 5 万亿美元，成为全球第一家实现这一里程碑的公司。
titleZh: NVIDIA成全球首家5万亿美元公司，“GPU帝国”GDP超日本、德国
titleEn: NVIDIA Becomes World's First $5 Trillion Company, "GPU Empire" Surpasses GDP of Japan and Germany
descriptionZh: 就在不久前，NVIDIA 的市值突破了 5 万亿美元，成为全球第一家实现这一里程碑的公司。
descriptionEn: Just moments ago, NVIDIA's market cap surpassed $5 trillion, making it the first company globally to achieve this milestone. Its current market value now exceeds the GDP of both Germany and Japan, effectively ranking as the "world's third-largest economy."
